Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: karate \ka*ra"te\ (k[aum]*r[aum]"t[asl]) n. [Japanese, empty hand.] a traditional Japanese system of unarmed combat; sharp blows and kicks are given to pressure-sensitive points on the body of the opponent. [WordNet 1.5]
karate n : a traditional Japanese system of unarmed combat; sharp blows and kicks are given to pressure-sensitive points on the body of the opponent
